body:
Here are the solid angles (in steradians) for the full Klems rows:


0.023909417
0.0237731163
0.0234119493
0.0273807841
0.0293333813
0.0349581625
0.0478687897
0.051801754
0.135517335


Note that we start at the zenith in the Klems subdivision, not at the horizon the way Tregenza's goes.


-Greg


P.S.  I used the command:


	cnt 145 | rcalc -f klems_ang.cal -e 'kbin=recno;$1=omega' | uniq
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2013-October/009824.html).</sup>
